'''Dan Friesen''' is the host and main researcher of Knowledge Fight.

== Involvement in Legal Proceedings ==

Dan was involved with some of the later depositions of Alex Jones in the [[Texas Sandy Hook Lawsuit (Heslin v. Jones)|Texas Sandy Hook Case]].
